named-query.name: User.findByAccountPasswd
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM User u WHERE u.accountId = :accountId AND u.password = :password

named-query.name: Answer.findLatestHistory
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM Answer a WHERE a.history.historyId = ( SELECT max(h.historyId) FROM History h WHERE h.user.userId = :userId ) ORDER BY a.answerId

named-query.name: Question.selectQuestionId
named-query.query: SELECT q.questionId FROM Question q WHERE q.subject.targetAge BETWEEN :schoolAgeFrom AND :schoolAgeTo AND q.questionId NOT IN :latestQuestions

named-query.name: Question.selectQuestions
named-query.query: SELECT q FROM Question q WHERE q.questionId IN :questionId
